title: Make Your Ideas Clickable With Kineto by JetBrains
description: While developing a website or an app, you’ll encounter loads of technical challenges that need to be solved – from how to code the functionality to how to host it. Delivering even a simple to-do app requires a hefty technology stack, a team of professionals, and hours of testing and maintenance. This is the reason […]
creator: Andrew Zakonov

title: RustRover 2025.2 Is Now Available
description: This version introduces major debugger enhancements, including remote and on-chip support, a new color scheme, improved borrow checker assistance, additional Rust learning resources, and more. RustRover goes AI Junie, the in-IDE coding agent, is now 30% faster, connects to external sources via MCP, and supports remote development. AI Assistant adds even smarter code completion for […]
creator: Kseniya Starodubtseva

title: 숨은 알짜 대명화학,패션·물류·항공까지 통합한 지주회사 - 스타트업
description: 제조기업인 줄 알았던 대명화학, 알고 보니 브랜드 플랫폼 대명화학은 이름만 들으면 전통적인 화학 제조기업처럼 들립니다. 하지만 이 기업의 진짜 정체는 지분투자를 기반으로 한 브랜드 인큐베이팅형 지주회사입니다. 코웰패션, 로젠택배, 에어로케이, K-뷰티 유통사 모스트까지 다양한 산업을 수직 계열화하며 안정적인 수익 기반과 폭발적인 성장성을 동시에 확보해가고
creator: 고명환

creator: Unknown

title: GoLand 2025.2 Is Now Out!
description: GoLand 2025.2 introduces updates for working with HTTP servers, smarter inspections powered by data flow analysis (DFA), and a new non-blocking Welcome screen. This release also brings significant quality improvements to golangci-lint support, including version 2, making the integration more robust for real-time code analysis. Let’s take a closer look at all the new additions […]
creator: Artem Pronichev

title: Building a human-computer interface for everyone
description:
What if you could control any device using only subtle hand movements? New research from Meta’s Reality Labs is pointing even more firmly toward wrist-worn devices using surface electromyography (sEMG) becoming the future of human-computer interaction. But how do you develop a wrist-worn input device that works for everyone? Generalization has been one of the [...]
Read More...
The post Building a human-computer interface for everyone appeared first on Engineering at Meta.
creator: Unknown

title: AI Assistant, Junie and Kineto Now Support GPT-5 by OpenAI
description: At JetBrains, we are committed to delivering the best technologies to professional developers. We support multiple LLM providers across our AI products to ensure you have access to the right tools for your needs and the freedom to choose the ones you prefer. Today, we’re excited to announce that the latest model from OpenAI, GPT-5, […]
creator: Anna Maltseva

title: Kotlin Notebook Meets IntelliJ Platform: Advancing IDE Plugin Development
description: The value of extensibility The ability to extend and customize software, from game mods to browser extensions, gives users a sense of freedom and the chance to bring their ideas to life. JetBrains IDEs already provide this sense of freedom through their support for plugins. For some time now, creating plugins for JetBrains IDEs has […]
creator: Jakub Chrzanowski

title: What’s New in vcpkg (July 2025)
description:
This blog post summarizes changes to the vcpkg package manager as part of the 2025.07.25 registry release, 2025-06-20, 2025-07-16, and 2025-07-21 tool releases, as well as changes to vcpkg documentation throughout July. This release includes a new command for printing package SPDX licenses, binary caching optimizations, and support for visionOS, Solaris, and illumos systems. Some […]
The post What’s New in vcpkg (July 2025) appeared first on C++ Team Blog.
creator: Augustin Popa

title: 에스토니아 스타트업 성공전략 - 디지털 국가에서 글로벌 창업하는 법
description: 에스토니아는 작은 나라지만 디지털 혁신의 선구자로, 전 세계에서 가장 앞선 전자정부 시스템을 보유한 국가 중 하나입니다. 특히  e-Residency 제도를 통해 세계 어디서나 온라인으로 법인 설립과 경영이 가능해, 글로벌 스타트업 창업자에게 매력적인 기회를 제공합니다. 이번 포스팅에서는 에스토니아 스타트업 생태계, 정부 지원정책,  e-Residency
creator: 고명환

title: 싱가포르 스타트업 성공 전략 - 아시아 창업 허브의 비밀
description: 싱가포르는 동남아시아 스타트업 생태계의 중심지로, 세계에서 가장 창업 친화적인 국가 중 하나로 꼽힙니다. 낮은 법인세, 글로벌 금융 허브, 영어 사용 환경, 그리고 정부 주도의 강력한 스타트업 지원정책 덕분에 아시아는 물론 글로벌 스타트업들이 싱가포르를 베이스캠프로 삼고 있습니다. 이번 포스팅에서는 싱가포르 스타트업 생태계의 특징, 주요 산업, 정부 지원정
creator: 고명환
